https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/7SEdoH6qBIYNhIV7H9cFSRe3wO1.jpg Tel Aviv, Israel. The twisted paths of three very different men brutally collide due to a chain of unspeakable murders: a grieving father who has been doomed to seek vengeance and a police detective who boldly crosses the narrow boundary between law and crime meet a religion teacher suspected of being the murderer. Big Bad Wolves
